column1: # NAME: LAKE MICHIGAN-HURON MONTHLY NET BASIN SUPPLIES
# DESCRIPTION: Residual net basin supplies (aggregate of runoff; overlake precipitation and evaporation)
# are calculated using: lake levels; inflow from Lake Superior; the outflow from Lake Michigan-Huron
# through St. Clair River and diversions. The residual net basin supplies are coordinated
# by the US Army Corps of Engineers and Environment and Climate Change Canada under the auspices of the
# Coordinating Committee on Great Lakes Basic Hydraulic and Hydrologic Data      www.greatlakescc.org
# All data for the previous 12 months should be considered provisional.
# NBS data starting from 1 January 2009 has not yet been coordinated.
# note: -9999 means that no data is available for that date
